segment.source: Planning: Customizing reference images for different audiences
segment.target: Planning: Customizing reference images for different audiences

segment.source: Planning: Customizing reference images for different audiences
segment.target: Planning: Customizing reference images for different audiences

segment.source: Planning: Customizing reference images for different audiences
segment.target: Planning: Customizing reference images for different audiences

segment.source: Instead of having one device design that tries to fit everyone, Windows image management tools can help you tailor device designs to meet the specific needs of various customers.
segment.target: Instead of having one device design that tries to fit everyone, Windows image management tools can help you tailor device designs to meet the specific needs of various customers.

segment.source: To get started, we recommend choosing a hardware design that targets a specific audience, market, or price point.
segment.target: To get started, we recommend choosing a hardware design that targets a specific audience, market, or price point.

segment.source: Build a base image for this design and test it.
segment.target: Build a base image for this design and test it.

segment.source: Next, customize Windows for that audience, include branding, logos, languages, and apps.
segment.target: Next, customize Windows for that audience, include branding, logos, languages, and apps.

segment.source: Device types
segment.target: Device types

segment.source: Consider creating separate designs for different device types, such as low-cost or performance laptops, or low-cost or performance desktops.
segment.target: Consider creating separate designs for different device types, such as low-cost or performance laptops, or low-cost or performance desktops.

segment.source: Each of these styles has different sets of critical differentiators, such as battery life or graphics performance.
segment.target: Each of these styles has different sets of critical differentiators, such as battery life or graphics performance.

segment.source: Although Windows includes base drivers for many common devices, some hardware requires specialized device drivers that must be installed and occasionally updated.
segment.target: Although Windows includes base drivers for many common devices, some hardware requires specialized device drivers that must be installed and occasionally updated.

segment.source: Many drivers are designed to be installed offline without booting the Windows image.
segment.target: Many drivers are designed to be installed offline without booting the Windows image.

segment.source: Use Windows Assessment tools to make sure that the apps and hardware that you're installing can perform well in a variety of circumstances.
segment.target: Use Windows Assessment tools to make sure that the apps and hardware that you're installing can perform well in a variety of circumstances.

segment.source: Architecture
segment.target: Architecture

segment.source: If you plan to build devices with both 64-bit and 32-bit (x86) chipsets and architectures, you'll need separate base images.
segment.target: If you plan to build devices with both 64-bit and 32-bit (x86) chipsets and architectures, you'll need separate base images.

segment.source: You'll also need different versions of drivers, packages, and updates.
segment.target: You'll also need different versions of drivers, packages, and updates.

segment.source: Retail customers and business customers
segment.target: Retail customers and business customers

segment.source: If your building designs for both retail and business customers, you can start with a single base edition such as Windows 10 Home or Windows 10 Pro, and then later upgrade it to a higher edition such as Windows 10 Enterprise, as needed.
segment.target: If your building designs for both retail and business customers, you can start with a single base edition such as Windows 10 Home or Windows 10 Pro, and then later upgrade it to a higher edition such as Windows 10 Enterprise, as needed.

segment.source: Once you've built a higher edition, however, you can't downgrade it to the lower edition.
segment.target: Once you've built a higher edition, however, you can't downgrade it to the lower edition.

segment.source: For more info, see Windows Upgrade Paths.
segment.target: For more info, see Windows Upgrade Paths.

segment.source: If you're building devices to sell to retail customers, you'll need to meet a set of minimum requirements.
segment.target: If you're building devices to sell to retail customers, you'll need to meet a set of minimum requirements.

segment.source: For info, see the Licensing and Policy guidance on the OEM Partner Center.
segment.target: For info, see the Licensing and Policy guidance on the OEM Partner Center.

segment.source: If you're building devices for businesses, you'll have fewer restrictions.
segment.target: If you're building devices for businesses, you'll have fewer restrictions.

segment.source: IT professionals can customize their devices in all sorts of ways.
segment.target: IT professionals can customize their devices in all sorts of ways.

segment.source: However, you should consider the implications of IT policies, as well as customer needs such as migrating data, activating security tools, and managing volume license agreements and product keys.
segment.target: However, you should consider the implications of IT policies, as well as customer needs such as migrating data, activating security tools, and managing volume license agreements and product keys.

segment.source: Regions
segment.target: Regions

segment.source: Consider creating different base images for different regions.
segment.target: Consider creating different base images for different regions.

segment.source: The resource files for Windows and other apps like Microsoft Office can be large - some resources like localized handwriting and speech recognition resources are several hundred megabytes.
segment.target: The resource files for Windows and other apps like Microsoft Office can be large - some resources like localized handwriting and speech recognition resources are several hundred megabytes.

segment.source: To save drive space, we've split up the language packs.
segment.target: To save drive space, we've split up the language packs.

segment.source: This can help you preload more languages for your customers or save space on your image.
segment.target: This can help you preload more languages for your customers or save space on your image.

segment.source: For example, to target a large region, you may preload the basic language components such as text and user interface files for many areas within the region, but only include the handwriting recognition for devices with pens, or only include voice and speech tools for Cortana on devices with integrated microphones.
segment.target: For example, to target a large region, you may preload the basic language components such as text and user interface files for many areas within the region, but only include the handwriting recognition for devices with pens, or only include voice and speech tools for Cortana on devices with integrated microphones.

segment.source: Users can download these components later as needed.
segment.target: Users can download these components later as needed.
